definition: providing or receiving nurture or parental care though not related by blood or legal ties, help develop, help grow
details:
adjective
- providing or receiving nurture or parental care though not related by blood or legal ties
= example: providing or receiving nurture or parental care though not related by blood or legal ties
= synonyms: surrogate
verb
- help develop, help grow
= synonyms: nurture
- bring up under fosterage
- promote the growth of
= synonyms: further
